scripts.start-backend:dev: cd backend && pipenv run flask run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=5051 --debug
scripts.start-backend:prod: cd backend && export FLASK_ENV=production && pipenv run gunicorn --workers 4 --bind 0.0.0.0:5051 "app:create_app()"
scripts.prod: npm run build-frontend && npm run start-backend:prod
